messages.content: Check my GitHub repositories and transfer the one with the most stars to Alexander Chen. You can find his email address in my inbox.

<function_thought>
The user has the following repositories: 'emmajohnson/file_compression', 'emmajohnson/image_transformation', 'emmajohnson/linear_algebra_operation'. The repository 'emmajohnson/file_compression' is starred, indicating it might have the most stars. Next, I will check the inbox to find Alexander Chen's email address in order to perform the transfer.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_received_emails]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

  body: 'Hi Emma,
